data.title: Start Support! 2 Types of Adventurer Packs Are Now Available
data.meta_description: Released and of good ratings!! This is the official website of the latest game, from the 'DanMachi' anime series, 'Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle (DanChro)'.
data.meta_site_name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle
data.text:
Thank you for continuously enjoying “Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle.”

New Pack Arrival!

Adventurers will always join you when purchasing one of 2 types of start support packs that are available from 8/24!

Starter! SSR Tiona Advventurer Pack

Icon Item Name Amount SSR Lady of the Two-Handed Blade: Tiona Hiryute

*If you have already joined, you can get 3 Bonds of the corresponding character. 1 Unit Water Falna S 10 Water Falna (S) 3 Excelia S 15 Excelia M 3 Valis 20,000

Starter! SSR Daphne Adventurer Pack

Icon Item Name Amount SSR Laurus Fuga: Daphne Lauros

*If you have already joined, you can get 3 bonds of the corresponding character. 1 Unit

Wind Falna S 10 Wind Falna M 3 Excelia S 15 Excelia M 3 Valis 20,000

Important Notice

The sales period and contents are subject to change without notice.

Packages may be resold after the sale period ends.

You can purchase up to the stated limit per account. Even if you change the platform you log in to, you cannot purchase more than the upper limit.

Please check the Shop for details on prices and content.

We hope you continue to support “Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle.”
